name: Alice
title: The Agile Rabbit
subtitle: A nimble warrior who combines grace with devastating power
lore: A mysterious warrior who takes the form of a humanoid rabbit, Alice combines incredible agility with earth-shattering power. Her playful demeanor masks her true strength, as she bounces across the battlefield delivering devastating blows to her enemies.

passive.name: Magic Shield
passive.description: Whenever you take magic damage, you gain a 2% magic shield that decays over 6 seconds (taking additional magic damage resets the decay). The shield stacks up to a cap of 50%.

Q.name: Charged Earthquake
Q.description: Click: Alice hits the ground, damaging nearby enemies [70/170/270/370/470]. Hold (max 2.5s), same effect but bigger radius and [90/190/290/410/700] damage.

W.name: Rabbit Tornado
W.description: Alice knocks enemies up around her for [0.7s] and dealing [75/180/260/400/500] damage.

E.name: Bunny Bounce
E.description: Alice jumps to the targeted spot. The ability gets a charge back if Alice successfully hits 3 autoattacks on the same enemy.

R.name: Cage of Fun
R.description: Alice creates a zone, becomes a spinning circle and stuns every enemy in the area for [0.5s]. The zone lasts for [2.5s].

1.name: Earthquake Shocker
1.description: Charged Earthquake now applies a slow of 40% for 2 seconds to all enemies hit

1.name: Rapid Rebound
1.description: Bunny Bounce's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds per charge, and Alice gains a 20% attack speed buff for 3 seconds after using Bunny Bounce.

1.name: Adaptive Defense
1.description: Now you also gain 2% Armor if you take physical damage.

5.name: Tornado Fury
5.description: Rabbit Tornado's damage is increased by 20%

5.name: Unyielding Stance
5.description: When Alice's health drops below 30%, she gains a shield equal to 12% of her maximum HP for 4 seconds. While the shield is active, Alice gains 10% tenacity. This effect has a 150-second cooldown.

10.name: Funhouse of Pain
10.description: Cage of Fun's duration is increased by 1 second, and enemies caught within the zone take 10% increased damage from all sources

10.name: Caged Despair
10.description: Enemies inside the Cage of Fun zone are slowed by 50% for 2 seconds after the stun effect wears off

15.name: Seismic Shock
15.description: Charged Earthquake now creates aftershocks, dealing 50% of the initial damage 1 second after the initial hit

15.name: Fur of Steel
15.description: Alice gains a 5% magic shield for 3s whenever she is crowd-controlled.

15.name: Leap of the Hare
15.description: Bunny Bounce now knocks up enemies in the area of impact for 0.5 seconds

20.name: Crushing Quake
20.description: Charged Earthquake now deals 50% bonus damage to enemies below 50% health

20.name: Furious Cyclone
20.description: Rabbit Tornado's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds, and the ability now pulls enemies slightly towards Alice before knocking them up.

20.name: Bunny Blitz
20.description: Bunny Bounce now has an additional charge, and each bounce grants Alice 20% bonus attack damage for 3 seconds

20.name: Cage of Agony
20.description: Enemies inside the zone have their healing reduced by 50% for the duration

weaknesses: Needs to stay in combat for maximum effectiveness
Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
